description:
NOTE: 
THIS IS AN UNOFFICIAL BOX APP,  IT WILL NOT GET YOU A 50GB BOX ACCOUNT, IT DOES CONTAIN SONE FUNCTION NOT PROVIDED BY THE OFFICIAL BOX APP.

THIS APPLICATION IS DESIGNED FOR PHONES, IT DOES WORK ON THE TOUCHPAD IN "EMULATOR MODE:

A full box.net cloud storage client. Log in to your box.net account and upload or download and share your files or folders all from your webOS device, with a great looking and very easy to use UI. Play your cloud images in a slideshow and play your cloud music with the built in audio player. Upload multiple images from your photo roll at once                                                                                                                                               (NOTE: THIS OPTION IS IN BETA), Create new folders and move/rename/copy files.                                                                    
 Create an  account and get 1GB of storage  free, with great sharing options. For more storage and other options checkout box.net online.                                                                          

NOTE: If you discover a bug & or have issues please contact me at support@abesapps.com , giving a bad review doesn’t help me fix issues.
